text: Titus Flavius T. f. T. n. Sabinus (8 - 69) was a famous politician and soldier in Roman Empire. He was born in Reate. Titus was a fair and honest man, but was overly sociable. At the end of the civil war, he was unable to hold the capital because he did not want to kill the Romans.Tacitus, Historiae, iii 75. ==References== Category:8 births Category:69 deaths
title: Titus Flavius Sabinus
